article.description: — Ali Abdou Dibba had 18 points in Abilene Christian's 59-45 victory over Fordham at the Paradise Jam on Sunday night.
article.headline: Abilene Christian defeats Fordham 59-45 at Paradise Jam
article.linkText: Abilene Christian defeats Fordham 59-45 at Paradise Jam
article.story: CHARLOTTE AMALIE, Virgin Islands -- — Ali Abdou Dibba had 18 points in Abilene Christian's 59-45 victory over Fordham at the Paradise Jam on Sunday night. Dibba also contributed five rebounds and three steals for the Wildcats (3-2). Aidan Igiehon scored eight points and added eight rebounds. Hunter Jack Madden shot 1 of 5 from the field and 6 for 9 from the line to finish with eight points. Abdou Tsimbila finished with 11 points, 11 rebounds and two blocks for the Rams (2-2). Japhet Medor added 10 points for Fordham. In addition, Jahmere Tripp finished with seven points. ------ The Associated Press created this story using technology provided by Data Skrive and data from Sportradar.

statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.
